Summary: Was driving and saw circle of lights in windshield. Looked up and it shot to north over lake erie.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my vehicle driving east on State Rt. 531, (Lake Road) in North Kingsville, 500 ft east of St. Rt. 193. I noticed a circle of lights in the sky and when I looked at it, it immediately darted to the north. It was a circle of approximately 8 white lights. I am aware that the Days Inn of Conneaut had a search light in operation for a special event. I considered that the search light was what I saw, but I later felt it was not. Perhaps others saw the same.
